DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine opioid and endocannabinoid mechanisms of exercise-induced analgesia in men and women.
DOC.brief_title: Attenuation of Pain in Men and Women
DOC.criteria: Healthy men and women current cardiac or other chronic diseases (e.g., cancer, diabetes, hypertension, kidney disease); routine use of prescriptive medications; history of vasovagal response to phlebotomy; an allergy to naltrexone; pregnancy; current smokers; current use of recreational drugs; history of substance abuse
